A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The continuity between episode 7 and 8 is just a mess. Things that were established in 7 and just abandoned in 8\, just to subvert expectations but in reality is just the hallmark of bad story telling. I disliked how as an audience member I have to know that it's the differing vision of the directors between the movies. As an audience member there should be a seamless coherent vision between the films. SPOILERS: Why did Luke even make the map in episode 7 if he's complaining about how he's never going to leave that island in episode 8. Why bother making the map? Or Rey's parents lineage being built up a lot\, only to be dashed in 8. Just a mess\, not a fan.
